title: Roamer
description: A useful tool for travellers and tourists to find places of interest in cities around the world. This was a group project that uses Leaflet for the map and API calls to Geoapify and OpenWeather.
features: Created with: React, Node.js, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Moment.js, Leaflet, React-Toastify, APIs

title: Workout Kitchen
description: A website that allows the user to search for recipes and exercises. This was a group project that utilises API calls to Spoonacular and Exercises by API Ninjas.
features: Created with: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, JQuery, JQuery UI, Ajax, APIs

title: Team Profile Generator
description: A command line application that allows the user to build an information page for their work team.
features: Created with: Node.js, Inquirer npm, Jest npm, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

title: README Generator
description: A command line application that creates a professional README markdown file based on the user's inputs.
features: Created with: Node.js and Inquirer npm

title: Code Quiz
description: A timed multiple-choice coding quiz that saves highscores to local storage.

title: Password Generator
description: A website that creates a secure and random password based on the criteria that the user selects.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A helpful work day scheduler that allows the user to type and save events into each hour slot.
features: Created with: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, JQuery, Moment.js
